name: Pyke
title: the Bloodharbor Ripper
lore: A renowned harpooner from the slaughter docks of Bilgewater, Pyke should have met his death in the belly of a gigantic jaull-fish… and yet, he returned. Now, stalking the dank alleys and backways of his former hometown, he uses his new supernatural gifts to bring a swift and gruesome end to those who make their fortune by exploiting others—and a city that prides itself on hunting monsters now finds a monster hunting them.
blurb: A renowned harpooner from the slaughter docks of Bilgewater, Pyke should have met his death in the belly of a gigantic jaull-fish… and yet, he returned. Now, stalking the dank alleys and backways of his former hometown, he uses his new supernatural...
allytips: Pyke is very fragile so don't be afraid to temporarily run from a fight. You can regenerate a significant amount of health from Gift of the Drowned Ones when enemies can't see you.
Hitting an enemy with the Hold version of Bone Skewer will always pull them the same distance. Use it in melee range to throw targets behind you.
The Tap version of Bone Skewer is much faster and deals additional damage.
A lot of your agressive spells are also your escapes. Make sure you always have a plan to get out of the fight.
enemytips: Pyke regenerates a significant amount of damage he has taken from enemy champions, but only when you can't see him!
When Pyke is hidden nearby in his Ghostwater Dive, sharks will circle underneath your feet.
Try not to stand near low health allies. If Pyke executes them using Death From Below, you might be next on the list.

riot_spell_q.name: Bone Skewer
riot_spell_q.description: Pyke either stabs enemies in front of him or pulls an enemy towards him.
riot_spell_q.tooltip:
Tap: Pyke stabs all enemies in front of him dealing {{ f5 }} (+{{ f6 }}) physical damage.

Hold: Pyke throws his harpoon, pulling the first enemy struck towards him and dealing {{ e1 }} (+{{ a1 }}) physical damage.

Targets hit by either attack are slowed by {{ e9 }}% for {{ e8 }} second.

Tapping deals {{ e0 }}% damage to minions and monsters beyond the closest.

riot_spell_w.name: Ghostwater Dive
riot_spell_w.description: Pyke enters Camouflage and gains significant movement speed that decays over time.
riot_spell_w.tooltip:
Pyke gains Camouflage and {{ e1 }}% (+{{ f7 }}%) decaying movement speed for {{ e0 }} seconds.

Stealth - Camouflage: Pyke is hidden from view while enemy champions remain outside his detection radius. Attacking or casting spells ends Camouflage.

riot_spell_e.name: Phantom Undertow
riot_spell_e.description: Pyke dashes and leaves behind a phantom that will return to him, stunning enemies along its path.
riot_spell_e.tooltip: Pyke dashes, leaving a drowned phantom behind him. After a short delay the phantom returns to Pyke, striking all enemies along its path dealing {{ e1 }} <scaleAD>(+{{ a1 }})</scaleAD> physical damage and stunning for {{ e2 }} <scaleLethality>(+{{ f10.01 }})</scaleLethality> seconds.

riot_spell_r.name: Death From Below
riot_spell_r.description: Pyke blinks to and executes low health enemies, allowing him to cast this spell again and granting additional gold to an ally who assists.
riot_spell_r.tooltip:
Pyke strikes all enemy champions in an X, blinking to and executing targets below {{ rdamage }} health. Enemies not executed instead take physical damage equal to the threshold.

When an enemy champion dies in the X from any source, an assisting ally also gains full kill gold and Pyke may re-cast Death From Below again within {{ rrecastduration }} seconds.

Total gold granted: {{ f9 }}

riot_spell_i.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
riot_spell_i.description: When Pyke is hidden from enemies, he regenerates damage that he has recently taken from champions. Pyke also cannot gain extra Maximum Health from any source, and instead gains Bonus AD.

wikia_champ.title: the Bloodharbor Ripper
wikia_champ.skill_r: Death from Below; Death from Below 2

wikia_skill_i1.name: Gift of the Drowned Ones
wikia_skill_i1.description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Pyke's''' maximum health cannot increase except through [[Growth#Increasing_Statistics|growth (per level)]], instead he gains{{ft|{{as|1 '''bonus''' attack damage}} {{as|per 14 '''bonus''' health}}|{{as|({{fd|7.143}}% '''bonus''' health)}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description2: '''Pyke''' also stores {{pp|key=%|30 to 81}} of the damage he takes from enemy champions as ''Grey Health'' on his {{as|health bar}}, up to 80 {{as|(+ 800% '''bonus''' AD)}}, with an upper cap of {{as|60% of his '''maximum''' health}}.
wikia_skill_i1.description3: When '''Pyke''' is unseen by enemies, he rapidly consumes his ''Grey Health'' to {{tip|heal}} for the same amount.
wikia_skill_i1.notes:
* Game elements that increase health based on the champion's health (e.g {{ii|Cinderhulk}}, {{iis|Gargoyle Stoneplate}}, {{ri|Overgrowth}}) will increase the health before getting converted by ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'', thus granting increased {{as|bonus AD}}.
* {{ii|Spirit Visage}} and {{tip|Grievous Wounds}} take effect after ''Gift of the Drowned Ones's'' healing cap.
*'''Pyke's''' ''Grey Health'' does not have a time limit, and will stay on his {{as|health bar}} until '''Pyke''' leaves enemy vision or dies.
* Since '''Pyke's''' '''maximum''' health cannot be increased, ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'' reaches {{as|60% of '''maximum''' health}} at {{pp|(0.6*(600+100*(x-1)*(0.7025+0.0175*(x-1)))-80)/8|color=ad}} {{as|'''bonus''' attack damage}}.
* Amount of attack damage granted from list of items that grants health, converted with ''Gift of the Drowned Ones'':
{{stat table header|item}}{{Do for every item|item table row|p1n=2|p1v=pykehealth}}
{{stat table footer}}

wikia_skill_q1.name: Bone Skewer
wikia_skill_q1.description: {{sbc|First Cast:}} '''Pyke''' {{ct|windup|winds up|cast=interrupts|items=false|consume=Disabled, but can use trinkets}} for up to 3 seconds, increasing ''Bone Skewer's'' range by up to 700 units while being {{tip|slow|slowed}} by 20%.
wikia_skill_q1.description2: {{sbc|Second Cast:}} '''Pyke''' hurls his harpoon towards the target location, dealing {{tip|physical damage|{{as|physical damage}}}} to the first enemy struck, {{tip|airborne|pulling}} them a fixed 550 units towards him and {{tip|slow|slowing}} them by 90% for 1 second.
wikia_skill_q1.description3: Releasing the ability within {{fd|0.5}} seconds causes '''Pyke''' to thrust his harpoon in a line, hitting the closest enemy unit, prioritizing enemy champions.
wikia_skill_q1.description4: If '''Pyke''' is interrupted during the charge, or the charge completes without reactivation, ''Bone Skewer'' is cancelled and the ability is put on full cooldown but refunds {{sti|mana|{{as|half the mana cost}}}}.
wikia_skill_q1.target_range: {{pp|type=channel time|7|400;400 to 1100|0;0.5 to 1|displayformula=400+(140 per 0.1 seconds, starting at 0.5 seconds). ''This is capped at 1 second.''}}
wikia_skill_q1.notes:
* Since the pull is a fixed distance, '''Pyke''' will throw enemies behind him if he uses the ability at close range.
* If '''Pyke''' casts the ability while it's on cooldown he will be unable to receive movement or attack commands for {{fd|0.25}} seconds.

wikia_skill_w1.name: Ghostwater Dive
wikia_skill_w1.description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Pyke''' enters {{tip|camouflage}} and gains {{sti|ms|{{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}}}} that decays over 5 seconds. Enemies are notified if '''Pyke''' is within X-units of them.
wikia_skill_w1.description2: Attacking or casting abilities immediately ends {{tip|camouflage}}.
wikia_skill_w1.notes:
* When '''Pyke''' is hidden nearby in his ''Ghostwater Dive'', sharks will circle underneath nearby enemies' feet and a sound will be played, changing based on the amount of health they have left.
** Enemies will hear a disturbing deadly warning tone if their health bar is under the threshold of ''Death from Below''.

wikia_skill_e1.name: Phantom Undertow
wikia_skill_e1.description2: After 1 second, the phantom returns to '''Pyke''', {{tip|stun|stunning}} enemies it passes through for {{fd|1.25}} {{as|(+ {{fd|0.1}} per 10 Lethality)}} seconds. Enemy champions also take {{as|physical damage}}.
wikia_skill_e1.notes: * The phantom hitbox is {{tt|100|approximative}} units radius.
